taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek epi-, upon, and gaia, earth, alluding to creeping habit]

bio:treatment.discussion: Epigaea comprises E. repens in eastern North America, E. asiatica Maximowicz in eastern Asia, and E. gaultherioides (Boissier & Balansa) Takhtajan in southwestern Asia (Caucasus region).
The species of Epigaea are infrequently cultivated; they are difficult to establish and maintain (M. A. Dirr 1998).
